Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local activeSound
local equipped
local assetAwarded = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function returnToDefault() wait(4.0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) end
local dog = Instance.new("Part") dog.Name = "Dog" dog.FormFactor = 3 dog.Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5) dog.CanCollide = true
local dogMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") dogMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68340830" dogMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68331520" dogMesh.Parent = dog
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, dog:GetMass() * 102, 0) float.Parent = dog
local activeSound
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) end local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(fire, 5) end end
-- He likes to throw things function annoy() while equipped and myTorso and myHumanoid do tick() local randomElement = math.random(1, 100) print(randomElement) local foundPlayer = false if randomElement < 40 then -- Throw a dog! activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("ItsaDog") if activeSound and math.random() < 0.33 then activeSound:Play() end local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and players[i] ~= vPlayer then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 25 then foundPlayer = false local dogClone = dog:Clone() dogClone.Parent = game.Workspace dogClone.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0 dogClone.Handle.Velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 40.0 debris:AddItem(dogClone, 5) break end end end if foundPlayer == false then local dogClone = dog:Clone() dogClone.Parent = game.Workspace dogClone.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0 dogClone.Velocity = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 30.0 debris:AddItem(dogClone, 10) end else local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and players[i] ~= vPlayer then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 25 then foundPlayer = true local asset = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(29939404):GetChildren()[1] print(asset, #asset:GetChildren()) if asset and asset:FindFirstChild("Handle") then asset = asset.Handle asset.Parent = game.Workspace asset.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0 asset.Velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 40.0 local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = asset local ff = float:Clone() ff.force = Vector3.new(0, asset:GetMass() * 102, 0) ff.Parent = asset if randomElement > 73 then asset.Touched:connect(blow) activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("LightFire") if activeSound and math.random() < 0.3 then activeSound:Play() end else activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereItGoes") if activeSound and math.random() < 0.3 then activeSound:Play() end end debris:AddItem(asset, 5) break end end end end if foundPlayer == false then local asset = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(29939404):GetChildren()[1] print(asset, #asset:GetChildren()) if asset and asset:FindFirstChild("Handle") then asset = asset.Handle asset.Parent = game.Workspace asset.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0 asset.Velocity = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 30.0 local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = asset local ff = float:Clone() ff.force = Vector3.new(0, asset:GetMass() * 102, 0) ff.Parent = asset if randomElement > 73 then asset.Touched:connect(blow) activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("LightFire") if activeSound and math.random() < 0.3 then activeSound:Play() end else activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereItGoes") if activeSound and math.random() < 0.3 then activeSound:Play() end end debris:AddItem(asset, 5) end end end wait(7.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
tick()
if math.random() < 0.33 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, -2.75) elseif math.random() < 0.67 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 1.8, -1.7) else Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(3, 1.8, -1.7) end
if math.random() < 0.65 then activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("Airhorn") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end end
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(returnToDefault))
wait(6.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() equipped = true vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(annoy)) end
function onUnequipped() if activeSound then activeSound:Stop() end equipped = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
